entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Provide well defined bahvior for `--` #35952

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • SDK resolver failure when an older SDK is also installed #35334
    Discussion
  • Use `packages.lock.json` instead of `project.assets.json`, if available #35556
  • Failing to publish self-contained app to `linux-bionic-arm64` #35518
  • Specifying a framework for multi-targeted dependencies that include a .NET Framework target does not work. #35341
  • [Bug]: ProjectReference not transitive during "Pack" on multi-targeted project #35567
  • [8.0.100-rc.2.23469.4] some deprecated global tools get NuGetPackageNotFoundException when installing #35566
  • Microsoft.NET.RuntimeIdentifierInference.targets incorrectly sets RID to win7-x86 / win7-x64 #35575
    8.0.2xx
  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    Backlog
  • Support for SxS workload manifests #32236
    8.0.1xx
  • Running dotnet build in Simplified Chinese environment may result in garbled code #35473
  • RuntimeIdentifiers `osx.11.0-arm64`, `osx.12-arm64` and `osx.13-arm64` are no longer recognized in .NET 8 RC1 #35516
    Discussion
  • .NET8 RC1 dotnet tool install <package> does not work when nuget.org is blocked #35517
  • `donet watch` fails on rebuilt with locked source generator dll (net8) #35607
  • `dotnet watch` silently fails when `launchSettings.json` contains comments #35558
  • NuGet.Build.Tasks.Pack.targets: Could not find a part of path #35738
  • dotnet publish fails on indirectly referenced "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web"-project #35656
  • Container tooling generates invalid application image when used with an OCI base image #35608
  • dotnet publish does not support DotNetPublishFiles #35581
  • restore failing on Alpine arm32 #35676
  • Native AOT publish ignores `DebugType=portable` #35798
  • Test projects do not automatically select a RuntimeIdentifier, breaking use of native libraries #35792
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts task's Analyzer resolution breaks Roslyn analyzer dependency isolation #35739
  • `ProjectReference` does not import build.props/build.targets to like `PackageReference` does #35704
  • NETSDK1202 should be a warning and not an error to prevent breaking extant libaries #35811
    Discussion
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816
    Discussion
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • AnalysisLevel `preview` is broken #35932
  • PublishCompressionFormats is not used during dotnet pack #35889
  • Containers: detection of port config should prefer ASPNETCORE_URLS #35845
  • Provide feed details when erroring on unauthorized feed #35842
  • [NETSDKE2E]Duplicate workload version info displays in dotnet --info of NET8 RTM SDK #35920
  • dotnet watch for WASM projects restart does not work #35930
  • Question: Offline self contained publish, what nuget packages? #35950
  • Runtime for migration bundle creation in Net7 #30466
  • Make mistyping errors gentler #17005
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to the svc pool for 7.0.4xx #35948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .gitignore to exclude files generated by test #35940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.2 in /eng/dependabot #35935
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35924
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat, 8.0.1xx

Updated

  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update the sdk target to net9.0 #35031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #35914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
